pr_title: Add a compiler phase to propagate constants before annotation process

timeline.message: Add a compiler phase to propagate constants before annotation process
Add test to check if constants are propagated before annotation process
Add BLangConstantRef type to hold constants refs
Modify annotation mapping in compiler plugin according to latest changes
fix language server compiler phases and visit const reference

Merge pull request #1 from nadeeshaan/fix-20733-irshad-master-local

Fix language server compiler phases and visit const reference
